channel.title: CVE Feed for EkoJR -- Advanced Post List

item.title: CVE-2024-33642|2024-04-26T07:21:06.434Z -- EkoJR -- Advanced Post List
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in EkoJR Advanced Post List allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Advanced Post List: from n/a through 0.5.6.1.
